law.catch_line: Penalties for violation of statutes relating to human service transportation delivery.
law.text: A broker or subcontractor who is determined by the cabinet to have violated the provisions of KRS 281.872, 281.873, 281.874, 281.875, 281.876, or 281.878, after an investigation and hearing conducted by the cabinet, shall have his or her contract revoked by the cabinet within ninety (90) days of the hearing and shall be prohibited from participating in the human service transportation delivery program for five (5) years from the date of the cabinet's determination.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000.
